title: Twitch Ult Bug
body: So I was playing as Twitch today and was pulling a sweet backdoor. I ulted for the extra damage but it turns out his ult doesn't damage the Nexus. I still damaged after my ult wore off but still. And to prove it isn't a one time thing me friend said it happened to him too. Rito pls

replies.body: its not a bug...its intentional....this is bloody 4 years old...get over it.
Well sorry sir, I wasn't around 4 years ago, and I've never heard anything about this.
Dw you're not the only one this happens to don't know if riot meant to do it but it's been a bug on him for quite a while now
